courseSectionInformation: 2 to 4 undergraduate hours. 2 to 4 graduate hours. 3 credit hour section is approved for B.S. in Learning and Education Studies.
description: Analyzes normative and conceptual aspects of the interrelationship of school and society, and of reciprocal influences between schools and major social trends and forces. 2 to 4 undergraduate hours. 2 to 4 graduate hours. 3 credit hour section is approved for B.S. in Learning and Education Studies.
label: School and Society
